I see a lot of people saying he's a legend, no he wasn't. He was a cheat like the rest. Conspiracy theories abound, laughable. The guy got caught cheating, couldn't handle being banned, turned into a paranoid cokehead and died due to taking some extra strong sniff. Marco Pantani died from cardiac arrest as a result of EPO. The viscosity of his blood was so high, that his heart failed. R.I.P.
A great talent.

If people can remember Indurain and his races back those days, Indurain was a complete package of a racer. He was a great time trialist, he could climb well, he had such power with his height that he destroyed people slowly but surely, gaining time when ever he could. We can criticise Pantani, but i loved watching Pantani race, he wasn't the best at time trials, not the best tactical racer in the pack during the non mountain stages.. But hell he was a beast of a climber, and he did it in such fluent dancing manner that it would look like he was just practicing musical scales. RIP, a great champion, cycling is so boring without Pantani.
just watch the first 40 seconds, this is why I love him, respect him. No one can climb like him
